roleset.name: examine closely

example.name: transitive, NP subject
example.text: Other credit houses, such as Credit Exchange and Solo Credit Service Corp., are suggesting that their clients study each order before shipping.

example.name: transitive, SBAR subject
example.text: Mr. Garcia acknowledges the problem and says the Asset Trust will study why the bidding failed and what changes the agency may be able to offer.
example.arg: why the bidding failed and what changes the agency may be able to offer

roleset.note: Those of you who have studied (heheh) Latin or any Romance languagesknow, of course, that "student" is merely "one studying".

predicate.note: Frames file for 'study' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes 14, 30.2, 34; no indication of other members.

example.text: First you go home and study up on what the coop system is all about, then we'll talk.
example.arg: on what the coop system is all about

predicate.note: Frames file for 'study_up' based on sentences in EBC.
